plot: Serge, a thirty-something scriptwriter, is melancholic, introverted and a loner. One day, he gets an appointment with a movie producer and pitches him his screenplay.
title: Grotesque Yamaguchi
plot_es: Serge, a thirty-something scriptwriter, is melancholic, introverted and a loner. One day, he gets an appointment with a movie producer and pitches him his screenplay.
plot_en: Serge, a thirty-something scriptwriter, is melancholic, introverted and a loner. One day, he gets an appointment with a movie producer and pitches him his screenplay.
